verses.verse: And a great <S%G3173><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> appeared <S%G3708><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> with the sun, <S%G2246><s%> and the moon <S%G4582><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> her feet, <S%G4228><s%> and on her head <S%G2776><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of twelve <S%G1427><s%> stars; <S%G792><s%>
and she was with child <S%G1722><s%>; <S%G1064><s%> and she cried <S%G2896><s%> out, being <S%G2192><s%> in labor <S%G5605><s%> and in pain <S%G928><s%> to give <S%G5088><s%> birth. <S%G5088><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> appeared <S%G3708><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> red <S%G4450><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and ten <S%G1176><s%> horns, <S%G2768><s%> and on his heads <S%G2776><s%> [were] seven <S%G2033><s%> diadems. <S%G1238><s%>

And his tail <S%G3769><s%> swept <S%G4951><s%> away <S%G4951><s%> a third <S%G5154><s%> of the stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and threw <S%G906><s%> them to the earth. <S%G1093><s%> And the dragon <S%G1404><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> who was about <S%G3195><s%> to give <S%G5088><s%> birth, <S%G5088><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that when <S%G3752><s%> she gave <S%G5088><s%> birth <S%G5088><s%> he might devour <S%G2719><s%> her child. <S%G5043><s%>

And she gave <S%G5088><s%> birth <S%G5088><s%> to a son, <S%G5207><s%> a male <S%G7021><s%> [child <S%G5043><s%>], who <S%G3739><s%> is to rule <S%G4165><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> with a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron; <S%G4603><s%> and her child was caught <S%G726><s%> up to God <S%G2316><s%> and to His throne. <S%G2362><s%>

And the woman <S%G1135><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> into the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> she had <S%G2192><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> by God, <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that there <S%G1563><s%> she might be nourished <S%G5142><s%> for one <S%G5507><s%> thousand <S%G5507><s%> two <S%G1250><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> and sixty <S%G1835><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

And there was war <S%G4171><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Michael <S%G3413><s%> and his angels <S%G32><s%> waging <S%G4170><s%> war <S%G4170><s%> with the dragon. <S%G1404><s%> And the dragon <S%G1404><s%> and his angels <S%G32><s%> waged <S%G4170><s%> war, <S%G4170><s%>
and they were not strong <S%G2480><s%> enough, <S%G2480><s%> and there was no <S%G3761><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> for them in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And the great <S%G3173><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%> was thrown <S%G906><s%> down, the serpent <S%G3789><s%> of old <S%G744><s%> who is called <S%G2564><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> and Satan, <S%G4567><s%> who deceives <S%G4105><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world; <S%G3625><s%> he was thrown <S%G906><s%> down to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and his angels <S%G32><s%> were thrown <S%G906><s%> down with him.

And I heard <S%G191><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Now <S%G737><s%> the salvation, <S%G4991><s%> and the power, <S%G1411><s%> and the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of our God <S%G2316><s%> and the authority <S%G1849><s%> of His Christ <S%G5547><s%> have come, <S%G1096><s%> for the accuser <S%G2725><s%> of our brethren <S%G80><s%> has been thrown <S%G906><s%> down, who accuses <S%G2723><s%> them before <S%G1799><s%> our God <S%G2316><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and night. <S%G3571><s%>

"And they overcame <S%G3528><s%> him because <S%G1223><s%> of the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of their testimony, <S%G3141><s%> and they did not love <S%G25><s%> their life <S%G5590><s%> even <S%G891><s%> to death. <S%G2288><s%>

"For this <S%G3778><s%> reason, <S%G1223><s%> rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> O heavens <S%G3772><s%> and you who dwell <S%G4637><s%> in them. Woe <S%G3759><s%> to the earth <S%G1093><s%> and the sea, <S%G2281><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> has come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to you, having <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wrath, <S%G2372><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> that he has <S%G2192><s%> [only] a short <S%G3641><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>"

And when <S%G3753><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> that he was thrown <S%G906><s%> down to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> he persecuted <S%G1377><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> gave <S%G5088><s%> birth <S%G5088><s%> to the male <S%G7021><s%> [child.]

And the two <S%G1417><s%> wings <S%G4420><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> eagle <S%G105><s%> were given <S%G1325><s%> to the woman, <S%G1135><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that she might fly <S%G4072><s%> into the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to her place, <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> she was nourished <S%G5142><s%> for a time <S%G2540><s%> and times <S%G2540><s%> and half <S%G2255><s%> a time, <S%G2540><s%> from the presence <S%G4383><s%> of the serpent. <S%G3789><s%>

And the serpent <S%G3789><s%> poured <S%G906><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a river <S%G4215><s%> out of his mouth <S%G4750><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> the woman, <S%G1135><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that he might cause <S%G4160><s%> her to be swept <S%G4216><s%> away <S%G4216><s%> with the flood. <S%G4216><s%>

And the earth <S%G1093><s%> helped <S%G997><s%> the woman, <S%G1135><s%> and the earth <S%G1093><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> its mouth <S%G4750><s%> and drank <S%G2666><s%> up the river <S%G4215><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> poured <S%G906><s%> out of his mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

And the dragon <S%G1404><s%> was enraged <S%G3710><s%> with the woman, <S%G1135><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> off <S%G565><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with the rest <S%G3062><s%> of her offspring, <S%G4690><s%> who keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and hold <S%G2192><s%> to the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
